queryParams.sign: Zodiac sign (options: aries, taurus, gemini, cancer, leo, virgo, libra, scorpio, sagittarius, capricorn, aquarius, pisces)

accepts.description: Get the latest news from Gloria AI

feed_categories.description: Comma separated list of feed categories. Available categories: crypto, macro, ai_agents, ondo, rwa

accepts.description: Fiat QR code payment, only supports dynamic QR codes with amounts, supports country VND, PHP, BRL, GEL.

query_params.appId: Application ID for identifying request source（此项不是必须填写的）
query_params.qrCode: QR code data containing payment information

accepts.description: TrueCast API - News aggregator and fact-checking service grounded by prediction markets. Real-time data sources include Perplexity, X AI, Tavily, Neynar, Pyth, DeFiLlama, Truemarkets, Zerion, Allora and more.

castHash.description: Optional Farcaster cast hash for context-specific verification

prompt.description: The statement, claim, or question to fact-check and verify

runGuardrail.description: Whether to run AWS Bedrock Guardrails validation (default: false)

storeToPinata.description: Whether to store the response to IPFS via Pinata (default: false)

assessment.description: The final truth assessment of the query

data_sources.description: Information from data sources used in verification

prompt.description: Prompt sent to this data source

guardrail.description: AWS Bedrock Guardrails validation results (if runGuardrail was true)

ipfs.description: IPFS storage information (if storeToPinata was true)

gatewayUrl.description: Public gateway URL for the stored response

paymentResponse.description: Payment transaction details if x402 was used

processingTimeSec.description: Time taken to process in seconds

totalSources.description: Total number of data sources queried

query.description: The original user query that was processed

reply.description: The fact-checked response with analysis and conclusions
